articles.description: You can take honey and black pepper to get rid of sore throat and pain.
articles.content: It is common to have a sore throat and pain due to the cold weather, and now, even Covid-19. To get rid of this problem, people keep taking different medicines. And yet, the pain refuses to go away. … [+1140 chars]
